definitions.definition: A short fibre left over from combing wool or spinning silk during the preparation of textile yarns . Sometimes it is referred to as 'Raw Silk', although this is somewhat of a misnomer .
examples: The silk noil was slightly nubby with random flecks in an off-white colour.

main_definition: A short fibre left over from combing wool or spinning silk during the preparation of textile yarns . Sometimes it is referred to as 'Raw Silk', although this is somewhat of a misnomer .
